meanings.definition: A person who visits a place of interest for pleasure or out of curiosity.
meanings.sent1: The sightseer enjoyed exploring the museum and taking photos.
meanings.sent2: The sightseer traveled to the Grand Canyon to see its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The sightseer couldn't resist stopping at every historical site along the way.
meanings.sent4: As a sightseer of nature, she soaked in the breathtaking views of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The sightseer's heart was filled with wonder at the sight of the ancient ruins.

meanings.definition: To visit places of interest as a sightseer.
meanings.sent1: They decided to sightseer around the city to discover its hidden gems.
meanings.sent2: She loves to sightseer in new cities to experience different cultures.
meanings.sent3: Let's sightseer through the park and see if we find any interesting birds.
meanings.sent4: He sightseered through the old town, capturing memories with his camera.
meanings.sent5: Sightseering along the coast, they marveled at the vastness of the ocean.
